p: Liang and Laine used spray pyrolysis method to synthesize Mg 0.5Ce 0.2Zr 1.8(PO 4) 3 nanopowders, where Ce 4+ partially substituted Zr 4+ in Mg 0.5Zr 2(PO 4) 3 (Liang et al., 2018). Mg 0.5Ce 0.2Zr 1.8(PO 4) 3 offered highest conductivity up to 3 × 10 −6 S cm −1 at 280°C, which was comparable with the previous report by Imanaka.
